name: Bullet League - 2D Battle Royale
description:
Fun and fast-paced 2D Royale Platformer - this is Battle Royale built for mobile. Play and compete in ranked matches with your friends, upgrade weapons to unlock new weapon abilities, and climb the leaderboards to be the best!

A NEW KIND OF BATTLE ROYALE EXPERIENCE
🔫 With BULLET PHYSICS your minigun can become a helicopter
🔫 COLLECT blueprints to level up and upgrade your weapons
🔫 BUILD platforms to escape dangers and trap your enemies.

A CHANGING BATTLEFIELD TO ADAPT TO
🏝️ LARGE areas to explore, with hidden rooms and areas
🏝️ DISCOVER rare items in hidden locations
🏝️ SUPPLY DROPS that give you top-tier weapons

TONS OF COOL STUFF TO EXPLORE
🔥 HUGE collection of characters to unlock and play
🔥 CUSTOMIZE everything from GRAVESTONES to BOXES
🔥 PROGRESS on the Trophy Road
